thread.title: Watch the Exact Moment the Cast of 'Moonlight' Realized They Won Best Picture
thread.title_full: Watch the Exact Moment the Cast of 'Moonlight' Realized They Won Best Picture

author: Erica Gonzales
title: Watch the Exact Moment the Cast of 'Moonlight' Realized They Won Best Picture
text:
Moonlight 's Oscar win for Best Picture came as a shock to many—especially the cast itself. After presenters Warren Beatty and Faye Dunaway announced that the Academy Award would go to La La Land , it was clarified mid-acceptance speech that the real winner was, in fact, the Barry Jenkins-directed drama. Jenkins and the cast approached the stage with surprise and a bit of apprehension over the whole mix-up, but this is what it looked like when the news was first confirmed:
Getty Advertisement - Continue Reading Below New footage we didn't see on air at ABC—which was probably retrieved from a live stream—shows a group of commentators realizing that La La Land did not actually win Best Picture. The broadcast then switches to a shot of the Moonlight cast celebrating their unexpected win and recovering from the shock. Best Supporting Actor winner Mahershala Ali is seen embracing his costars as he joins Jenkins, Naomie Harris and the rest of the team in walking towards the stage, mouths completely agape.
